Name: Pineapple Daiquiri (simple but tasty recipe)
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Light rum provides vibrancy while aged rum adds rich complexity. Pineapple juice adds tropical fruitiness and replaces the dilution necessary to open and amplify a classic Daiquiri.
History: Recipe created in July 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Daiquiri (simple but tasty recipe) contains 207 calories
